description: This file defines classes for managing AWS Glue crawlers and their S3 targets, including creation, reading, deletion, and starting crawlers, with integration to AWS SDK and logging.

classes.name: GlueS3Target
classes.description: Represents an S3 target for AWS Glue crawler, including path, exclusions, connection, and queue ARNs.

classes.name: GlueCrawler
classes.description: Represents an AWS Glue crawler with methods to create, read, delete, and start the crawler, managing its configuration and targets.

methods.name: get_glue_crawler_targets
methods.description: Constructs and returns the crawler's target configuration, including S3 targets with optional parameters.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates the Glue crawler in AWS using provided configuration and AWS SDK client.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads the current state of the Glue crawler from AWS and updates internal attributes.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the Glue crawler from AWS.

methods.name: start_crawler
methods.description: Starts the Glue crawler, handling exceptions if it is already running.
